title: Merry Tom of all trades; or, A trick to get money at every dead lift, made known by Tom of all Trades, that bravely could shift, from one place to another, about he did range, and at his own pleasure his trade he could change. The tune is, Behold the man.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for I. Wriight [sic], I. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger,
